SELECT u.login as login, u.name as name, user_role.role as permission FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles user_role ON user_role.user_id=u.id AND user_role.role=#{query.permission}
AND user_role.resource_id=#{componentId}
AND user_role.resource_id IS NULL
AND user_role.role IS NOT NULL
AND user_role.role IS NULL
AND (UPPER(u.name) LIKE #{query.searchSql} ESCAPE '/')
ORDER BY u.name
